title: Innum Enna Thozha Lyrics 7am arivu song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Balram, Naresh Iyer and Suchith Suresan
Lyrics: Pa Vijay

Music: Harris Jeyaraj
Movie: 7am arivu

Innum Enna Thozha, Ethanayo Naala
Nammai Ingu Namey Thozaithomey!!
Nammaal mudiyadha nammaal mudiyaadhaa
Naalai vellum naalai seivome..
Yaarum illai thadai poda
unnai mella idai poda
nambikayil nadai poda sammadhame
enna illai unnodu
yekam enna kannodu
vetri endrum vazhiyodu pirandhidume

Vandhaal alaiyaai varuvom
vilndhaal vidhayaai vilvom
meendum meendum azhuvom, azhuvom
Innum innum iruga
ulle uyirum uruga
ilamai padaye varuga
Aezhuga... (Innum enna thozha)

Manam ninaithaal,adhai dhinam ninaithaal
nenja ninaithadhai mudikalaam,
Thodu vaanam dhinam thodum dhooram
pala kaikalai serkkalaam

Vidhai vidhaithaal nellai vidhai vidhaithaal
adhil kallendrum mulaikumaa
Nam thalaikuraigal nooru kadandhaalum
thanda veerangal marakkumaa

Ore manam ore gunam ore thadam edhirgaalathil
adhe balam adhe dhidam agam puram nam dhegathil

Kalluthoodum oru aayudhathai
Dhinam Kalangalil sumakirom
Aezhuthodum oru aayudhathai
engal mozhiyinil suvvaikirom
pani moottam vandhu panidhenna
sudum pagalavan maraiyuma
andha pagai moottam vandhu paniyaamal
engal iru vizhi uranguma

Idho idho innaindhadho, inam inam nam kaiyodu
Adho adho therindhadho, idam idam nam kannodu

Yaarum illai thadai poda
unnai mella idai poda
nambikayil nadai poda sammadhame
enna illai unnodu
yekam enna kannodu
vetri endrum vazhiyodu pirandhidume

Vandhaal alaiyaai varuvom
vilndhaal vidhayaai vilvom
meendum meendum azhuvom, azhuvom

Innum innum iruga,ulle uyirum uruga
ilamai padaye varuga, Aezhuga...
